settings.title: All-Natural Soda | What is All-Natural - All-Natural Alcoholic Drinks
settings.subtitle: Interested in a healthy all-natural alternative to soda? We discuss what all-natural is, the benefits of all-natural soda, all-natural alcoholic drinks, and more!

settings.title: All Natural Soda
settings.desc:
Perfy all-natural sodas are made without any artificial flavors, colors, sweeteners, or preservatives. At Perfy, we only use the highest quality ingredients to create our delicious all-natural sodas including real fruit juice, all-natural sweeteners, nootropics, and adaptogens.

Let's discuss what all-natural means, what Perfy soda is, the benefits of Perfy soda, and some must-try all-natural alcoholic drinks!

settings.title: What Does All-Natural Mean?
settings.desc:
The term all-natural is often used to market food and drinks as being healthy, but what does all-natural actually mean? All-natural means that a product is free of any artificial ingredients or chemicals.

All-natural products are made with only natural ingredients that come from the earth. This includes all-natural fruits, vegetables, meats, grains, dairy, etc.

Now that we know what all-natural means, let's discuss what all-natural soda is!

settings.title: What Is All-Natural Soda?
settings.desc:
All-natural soda is made with only natural ingredients and no artificial flavors, colors, sweeteners, or preservatives. All-natural sodas are also typically lower in sugar than traditional sodas.

Perfy is an all-natural soda that contains real fruit juice, all-natural sweeteners including stevia, allulose, and monk fruit, as well as L-theanine, ashwagandha, and turmeric to help boost cognition and mood.

settings.title: Additional Benefits of Perfy All-Natural Soda
settings.subtitle: Perfy all-natural soda offers many benefits over traditional sodas. Benefits include:
settings.desc:
Less sugar than traditional sodas.

Keto-friendly!

Fewer calories. This can be helpful for those trying to lose weight or maintain a healthy weight.

No artificial ingredients.

Caffeine-free, so you can enjoy it any time of day.

Gluten-free, allowing those following a gluten-free diet to enjoy a refreshing soda.

No GMOs!

Vegan, making it a great choice for those following a vegan lifestyle.

Perfy all-natural soda was developed to boost cognition and mood while mitigating stress and anxiety. We do so with a blend of nootropics and adaptogens like L-theanine, ashwagandha, and turmeric.

settings.title: All-Natural Alcoholic Drink Recipes
settings.desc:
If you're looking for a way to enjoy all-natural alcoholic beverages, consider mixing a Perfy soda with your favorite liquor. From whiskey to vodka, rum, or gin, there are many ways to enjoy an alcoholic beverage while only drinking all-natural ingredients.
